title: 299-300: Fierce Sword Attacks! Zoro vs. Kaku - Never Watched One Piece

description: Detailed blog post reviewing episodes 299-300, discussing the Zoro vs Kaku fight, Robin's desperation, and Franky's personal stakes in the rescue. Expresses sympathy for Kaku and analyzes Spandam as an irredeemable villain.
